tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Locations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AR_markers (
    marker_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id UUID,
    marker_name VARCHAR(255),
    marker_image_url TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50),
   email VARCHAR(100),
   location_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
   activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   activity_type VARCHAR(50),
   activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
CREATE TABLE locations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR, latitude DECIMAL, longitude DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR, email VARCHAR, age INT);
CREATE TABLE tasks (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR, description TEXT, assigned_to INT REFERENCES users(id));
CREATE TABLE events (id INT PRIMARY KEY, event_name VARCHAR, event_date DATE, location_id INT REFERENCES locations(id));
CREATE TABLE interactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(id), location_id INT REFERENCES locations(id), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
